text: Arthur Bunting (July/September 1936 â€“ 7 June 2017) was an English professional rugby league footballer. He played in the 1950s, and 1960s, and coached in the 1960s, 1970s, and 1980s, playing at club level for Hull Kingston Rovers, as a Scrum-half/Halfback, i.e. number 7, and coaching at club level for Hull Kingston Rovers, and Hull F.C.. He was born in Hemsworth, West Yorkshire. Bunting died on 7 June 2017 in Kingston upon Hull, East Riding of Yorkshire at the age of 80.Arthur Bunting: Hull FC mourn death of legendary coach, aged 80 ==References== ==Other websites== *Search for "Bunting" at rugbyleagueproject.org *Workington and Hull KR triumph in the regions Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: Arthur Bunting
